column1: process-rate 	The average number of records processed by a source processor node per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics
process-total 	The total number of records processed by a source processor node per second. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics
suppression-emit-rate 	The rate at which records that have been emitted downstream from suppression operation nodes. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics
suppression-emit-total 	The total number of records that have been emitted downstream from suppression operation nodes. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics
record-e2e-latency-avg 	The average end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics

column1: record-e2e-latency-max 	The maximum end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics

column1: record-e2e-latency-min 	The minimum end-to-end latency of a record
column2: measured by comparing the record timestamp with the system time when it has been fully processed by the node. 	kafka.streams:type=stream-processor-node-metrics
